thread.title: SGI Announces New Paris Office and New Latin America Division
thread.title_full: SGI Announces New Paris Office and New Latin America Division

title: SGI Announces New Paris Office and New Latin America Division
text:
SGI Announces New Paris Office and New Latin America Division August 17, 2015 
Sakkara Group International, the parent group of Central Holidays and STI Travel, is making changes to its brands. The company is opening a new Central Holidays office in Paris that will focus on inbound destination management services aimed at growing its travel offerings in France. 
SGI also said it will hire a new general manager to work out of the STI Travel UK office in London. The new GM will be responsible for increasing the companyâ€™s UK outbound travel bookings to North and South America. The group said that it will launch its first Latin American division for STI Travel USA. The new division will be led by Arthur Berman, a travel veteran who most recently served as the executive vice president for Latour. The division will feature an expanded range of itineraries throughout Latin America, including new Cuban tours. 0
